channel.title: Text a computer to restart serv?
channel.description:
someone was able to do this a while back, forgot who
but like, they could send a text message, and it would restart the persons server
example: bob is at the movies bob gets a text "server's off" bob texts "restart" to 55555 server restarts bob gets a text "thanks <3"
any clues?

item.title: Text a computer to restart serv?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“silabgarza, post:1, topic:326562”]someone was able to do this a while back, forgot who

but like, they could send a text message, and it would restart the persons server

example: bob is at the movies
bob gets a text “server’s off”
bob texts “restart” to 55555
server restarts
bob gets a text “thanks <3”

any clues?[/quote]

55555 is his mums number so then she just restarts.
